Feeling blue? So is the ocean! But how did it get that way?

From the coast, it may appear a deep blue on a sunny day. Or gray when itâ€™s stormy. However, the blue hue is created by water itself! Learn more about the ocean and its colors. #MondayLearning
Why is the ocean blue? - Woods Hole Oceanographic Institution
One idea is that it reflects the sky. But if we sink below the surface, the blue color remains. Here, the water isnâ€™t reflecting the sky. So why is the ocean blue?
